synopsis.text: Scorpion, a notorious assassin, and the cunning Phantom Thief Kid both have their sights set on the Russian Imperial Easter Egg, a priceless artifact that has recently been discovered in Osaka. As the Osaka police force and renowned detective Kogoro Mori scramble to protect the egg, young Conan Edogawa finds himself drawn into the case. With a series of murders connected to the egg and a tragic history tied to the Romanov Dynasty, Conan must navigate the dangerous web of intrigue to uncover the truth, all while concealing his true identity from those around him. As the race to possess the egg intensifies, Conan must outwit both the thief and the assassin to protect those close to him and solve the mysterious murders.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
